```{r}   
options(digitis = 3)

library(tidyverse)
library(haven)
library(posterior)
library(dbarts)
library(parallel)

```

Load data
```{r}
dt <- readRDS("data/dtwp.rds")
colnames(dt)
```


Run main Prince BART
```{r}
source("R/princeB.r")
mrm <- mc_psbart(dt
  # iterations  drop
  , n_warmup =  100
  # iterations to keep
  , n_samples = 150
  # chains
  , n_chains = 20
  ,  keep_trees = FALSE
)


mate_c(mrm)
matt_c(mrm)
sate_c(mrm)
satt_c(mrm)
```
